sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

function Nav() {

     const handleNavigation = (sectionId, behavior = 'smooth', block = 'start', inline = 'nearest') => {
    document.getElementById(sectionId).scrollIntoView({ behavior, block, inline });
  };

  return (
    <>
       <header className="fixed top-0 left-0 w-full bg-gray-900 text-white z-50">
        <nav className="container mx-auto p-4 flex justify-center space-x-4">
          <button onClick={() => handleNavigation('formacion')} className="hover:underline">
            Formación
          </button>
          <button onClick={() => handleNavigation('experiencia', 'smooth', 'center')} className="hover:underline">
            Experiencia
          </button>
          <button onClick={() => handleNavigation('proyectos', 'smooth', 'end')} className="hover:underline">
            Proyectos
          </button>
          <button onClick={() => handleNavigation('contacto', 'smooth', 'start', 'end')} className="hover:underline">
            Contacto
          </button>
        </nav>
      </header>
    </>
  )
}

export default Nav
